about_the_game:
CPUCores :: Network Monitor Lite will allow you to check the performance of your network connection by examining the network quality on every hop between you and your game server/destination of choice. You can examine what exactly is causing latency and/or packetloss issues by examining network traffic data on a per-node point.

This DLC will allow you to:

  • Click a single button to determine every hop between you and a server on the Internet (defaults to 8.8.8.8)
  • Allows you to edit the server it polls (can put in any website, any game server, etc)
  • Determine every hop between your computer and the server you indicate on the Internet
  • Polls every hop and determines network latency (ICMP ECHO) between you and that server
  • Keeps track of packetloss on each hop
  • Displays a graph demonstrating traffic quality/jitter on each hop

This DLC will assist you in troubleshooting where potential network slow-downs occur between you and whatever game server you're playing on. This allows you to determine if it is an issue with your wifi, local network, your ISP, your game server, and more.

Screenshots:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Any CPU
  • Graphics: Any semi-modern GPU
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Any CPU
  • Graphics: Any semi-modern GPU

short_description: CPUCores :: Network Monitor Lite will allow you to check the performance of your network connection by examining the latency between every hop from you to your game server/destination of choice.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian
